column5: Madi was a healthy 12-year-old athlete before she spent 93 days in the hospital due to #flu. It's been 8 years and she still suffers with chronic illness and lung disease. Her story is a reminder of what can happen the one year you skip the flu #vaccine. https://t.co/OzZbI19v9Z https://t.co/xBZyXVueQM
